sense.name: a consumer of nutrients
sense.commentary: EATER[+entity][+organism][+consumer][+nutrient] Note: EATER[+agent] the one who eats
sense.examples: Carnivores are basically meat eaters. The football team were all hearty eaters after a game. The baby has become a good little eater of late. These bacteria are oil eaters and are employed to clean up oil spills in the ocean.

sense.name: edible tasty produce
sense.commentary: EATER[+entity][+organism][+plant][+edible][+produce] Note: EATER[+patient], the thing that is eaten
sense.examples: These local heirloom apples are good eaters. Those cucumbers are not such good eaters but make tasty pickle relish.
